links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (Haskell)a035302 n = a035302_list !! (n-1)a035302_list = 0 : 1 : (-2) :   zipWith (+) (drop 2 $ map (* 2) a035302_list)               (map (* 4) $ zipWith (-) a035302_list $ tail a035302_list)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 18 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
